mapper.insert: insert into cal_emp(cal_no, emp_no, cal_title, cal_content,cal_start_date ,cal_end_date , cal_color) values (cal_no_seq.nextval, #{empNo}, #{calTitle}, #{calContent},#{calStartDate} ,#{calEndDate},#{calColor})
